description:
Serving the injured and disabled throughout North Carolina since 1973, the dedicated legal professionals at Brent Adams & Associates are here to help you and your family through what is likely a very difficult and uncertain time in your life. To that end, our law firm offers exceptional representation for those dealing with personal injury claims, Social Security Disability, workers' compensation, bankruptcy and other areas affecting their livelihoods, their finances and their future.

Our law office in Clinton, North Carolina, is one of four we have in the state, lending testament to the level of success we have achieved advocating on behalf of innocent accident victims as well as those seeking relief from their overwhelming debt. Through our personal injury practice, we have recovered millions of dollars in settlements and awards for our clients, earning our membership in the Million Dollar Advocates Forum.

This level of success is the direct result of our unwavering commitment to those we serve, and our attorneys have received numerous awards and honors for their professionalism and service, including recognition from various peer review sources and being among the top trial attorneys in the country for high-stakes litigation. We also have on staff a board-certified specialist in Social Security Disability, so you can expect to receive the highest level of advocacy and support possible no matter how complex your needs.

To discuss your situation with one of our experienced and dedicated attorneys, you can contact Brent Adams & Associates by calling our law office or visiting our website to schedule a free initial consultation.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
